puavo.puavomenu.tags.description: Control which programs, menus and categories should be visible or hidden in Puavomenu

puavo.puavomenu.show_my_school_users.description: If true, show a tool to see school user list

puavo.puavomenu.sidebar_hide_elements.description: A space-separated list of Puavomenu sidebar elements to hide (avatar change_password hostinfo laptop_settings lock_screen logout puavopkg_installer restart shutdown sleep_mode support system_settings)

puavo.puavomenu.password_change.link.description: Set to use a non-standard password change URL, variables such as $(username) are replaced in string
